name: ambassador
description: open source Kubernetes-native API gateway for microservices built on the Envoy Proxy

name: node-red-contrib-hcl-iterate-loop
description: This Node-RED node allows you to build loops, just like a for loop in any programming language do, iterating over the selected parts in the flow. Playing with the starting point, increment/decrement values and condition to be evaluated in each iteration.

name: volt-mx-ls-toolkit
description: Toolkit to enable better integration between HCL Software products HCL Volt MX and HCL Domino. This is LotusScript toolkit for running HCL Domino agents as REST services, with specific helpers for JSON in-out and a specific payload recommended for HCL Volt MX

name: connections-automation
description: Deployment and upgrade automation scripts for HCL Connections 7.0 based on Ansible

name: HCL-TECH-SOFTWARE.github.io
description: Landing page for searching HCL Software GitHub repositories, viewable at https://hcl-tech-software.github.io/index.html

name: Examples
description: Ready-to-use examples that showcase features of IBM's Rational Integration Tester (RIT) and Rational Test Control Panel (RTCP).
